twitter.description: I like to see movies so much. When I have time, I spend most of the spared time on watching classic movies. Though some people believe that it is a waste of time to spend time on this amusement, actually, they are wrong. Watching movies is a good way to broaden our vision. A good movie always shows something about culture or social problems, so as to catch more people’s attention and help them to think about the problem. We can perceive the world through excellent movies. When culture shock happens, we will considerate what we always believe is right needs to be changed. Our viewpoint about the world gets improved and helps us to be a better man. Reading books may be boring for some people, while watching movie is a fun way to gain knowledge.
